byooption.longDescription: The M Performance Floor Mats bring a sporty touch to the footwells of your BMW. The composite technology of rubber and textile fibers means that these floor mats combine the high quality look and fell of textiles with the dirt and water-repellent properties of all-weather mats.
byooption.name: BMW M Performance Floor Mats

accessories.description: The M Performance Floor Mats bring a sporty touch to the footwells of your BMW. The composite technology of rubber and textile fibers means that these floor mats combine the high quality look and fell of textiles with the dirt and water-repellent properties of all-weather mats.
accessories.name: BMW M Performance Floor Mats

byooption.longDescription: Custom designed tray contours to the shape of the floor, offering additional protection that regular mats do not offer. Allows for water runoff to help protect shoes and other items. Easy to clean and maintain. Available in black and beige.
byooption.name: BMW All Weather Floor Liners

accessories.description: Custom designed tray contours to the shape of the floor, offering additional protection that regular mats do not offer. Allows for water runoff to help protect shoes and other items. Easy to clean and maintain. Available in black and beige.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+

Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byoConfiguration.driveTrain: M tuned xDrive intelligent all-wheel drive system
byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW X6 M models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $1,259 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $98,566 (MSRP of $106,795, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $4,500 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,729 and $2,000 Lease Credit).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $4,500 down payment, $1,259 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.30/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $61,941.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: An allure of brilliance highlights the exterior of your BMW with satin aluminum line trim.
byooption.name: Satin aluminum line exterior trim

options.description: An allure of brilliance highlights the exterior of your BMW with satin aluminum line trim.
options.name: Satin aluminum line exterior trim

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

options.description: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
options.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
options.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: The Bang & Olufsen High-End Surround Sound System features 16 perfectly integrated loudspeakers that deliver a rich sound. Thanks to the patented Acoustic Lens Technology, every passenger-wherever they are seated in the cabin-enjoys an equal distribution of brilliant sound. And in true BMW style, the Surround Sound System blends aesthetics and function for a truly alluring design.
byooption.name: Bang & Olufsen Sound System

options.description: The Bang & Olufsen High-End Surround Sound System features 16 perfectly integrated loudspeakers that deliver a rich sound. Thanks to the patented Acoustic Lens Technology, every passenger-wherever they are seated in the cabin-enjoys an equal distribution of brilliant sound. And in true BMW style, the Surround Sound System blends aesthetics and function for a truly alluring design.
options.name: Bang & Olufsen Sound System

byooption.longDescription: The entertainment system includes two 9.2-inch color screens integrated into the back of the front seats.  The tilt-adjustable monitors can be operated independently and can accommodate MP3 players, game consoles and headphones (not included).   All audio and video sources in the vehicle can be operated from the rear using a remote control.
byooption.name: Rear-seat entertainment Professional

options.description: The entertainment system includes two 9.2-inch color screens integrated into the back of the front seats.  The tilt-adjustable monitors can be operated independently and can accommodate MP3 players, game consoles and headphones (not included).   All audio and video sources in the vehicle can be operated from the rear using a remote control.
options.name: Rear-seat entertainment Professional

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

options.description: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
options.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
byooption.longDescription: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
byooption.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

options.description: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
options.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
options.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

byooption.longDescription: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

packages.description: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
packages.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

byooption.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
byooption.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

options.description: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
options.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

byooption.longDescription: Seeing a wide-angle view of your surroundings in the Control Display makes it easier to maneuver in tight spaces and avoid pulling into unseen traffic when emerging from a garage.
byooption.name: Surround View

options.description: Seeing a wide-angle view of your surroundings in the Control Display makes it easier to maneuver in tight spaces and avoid pulling into unseen traffic when emerging from a garage.
options.name: Surround View

byooption.disclaimer: Navigation and Head-up Display may be optional equipment; check with your local BMW dealer.
byooption.longDescription: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
byooption.name: Speed Limit Info

options.description: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
options.disclaimer: Navigation and Head-up Display may be optional equipment; check with your local BMW dealer.
options.name: Speed Limit Info

byooption.longDescription: The Executive Package puts the emphasis on convenience. Head-up Display keeps your eyes rested while concentrating on the road ahead. Thoughtful enhancements, like soft-close doors and Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot, add to the pleasure of every trip.
byooption.name: Executive Package

packages.description: The Executive Package puts the emphasis on convenience. Head-up Display keeps your eyes rested while concentrating on the road ahead. Thoughtful enhancements, like soft-close doors and Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot, add to the pleasure of every trip.
packages.name: Executive Package

byooption.longDescription: Manual roller sunblinds for the rear side windows help keep the sun’s heat and glare out of the passenger compartment, while providing privacy for rear-seat passengers. The blinds also create a comfortable environment for sleeping infants and children.
byooption.name: Rear manual side window shades

options.description: Manual roller sunblinds for the rear side windows help keep the sun’s heat and glare out of the passenger compartment, while providing privacy for rear-seat passengers. The blinds also create a comfortable environment for sleeping infants and children.
options.name: Rear manual side window shades

byooption.longDescription: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
byooption.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

options.description: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
options.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
byooption.name: Automatic high beams

options.description: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
options.name: Automatic high beams

byooption.longDescription: A welcome cool-weather feature for left and right rear-seat occupants. With the touch of a button, passengers can individually select their preferred level of warmth.
byooption.name: Heated rear seats

options.description: A welcome cool-weather feature for left and right rear-seat occupants. With the touch of a button, passengers can individually select their preferred level of warmth.
options.name: Heated rear seats

byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
byooption.name: Heated Steering Wheel

options.description: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.
options.name: Heated Steering Wheel

byooption.longDescription: The soft-close door feature uses small electric motors to gently close all doors with minimal effort. Simply close the door gently and the electric mechanism safely and conveniently draws it to the fully closed position.
byooption.name: Soft-close automatic doors

options.description: The soft-close door feature uses small electric motors to gently close all doors with minimal effort. Simply close the door gently and the electric mechanism safely and conveniently draws it to the fully closed position.
options.name: Soft-close automatic doors

byooption.longDescription: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
byooption.name: Head-up Display

options.description: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
options.name: Head-up Display

byooption.longDescription: Ventilated front seats gently blow your choice of warm or cool air upward through the micro-perforated leather, helping to keep you comfortable all year long.
byooption.name: Front ventilated seats

options.description: Ventilated front seats gently blow your choice of warm or cool air upward through the micro-perforated leather, helping to keep you comfortable all year long.
options.name: Front ventilated seats

byooption.longDescription: It’s like having your own social secretary. Part of BMW ConnectedDrive, Concierge Services provides unlimited access to personalized directions and advice, such as restaurant and hotel recommendations and reservations, movie times, flight information and more. In addition, your destination address and phone number can be sent to your BMW - and if you have the on-board Navigation system, it can be transferred there for route guidance.
byooption.name: Concierge Services
